annotation: ✅ Best Practice: Initialize __all__ to control what is exported when using 'from module import *'
label: best_practice

annotation: ⚠️ SAST Risk (Medium): Using 'import *' can lead to namespace pollution and make it unclear which names are present in the namespace
label: sast_risk
